title: Water levels at reservoir rising
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Irrigation said that the water levels in the main reservoirs has risen to 66%.
Director of the Water Management Unit, D.J. Abeysiriwardena said that the release of water for the Yala season has commenced following the rise in water levels.
Be careful of those attempting to incite violence among protestors: AKD
